oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Innovative organic farming in india
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Sharma, Arun K.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: "Organics" in general
Farming Systems
Crop husbandry
Biodiversity and ecosystem services
Research methodology and philosophy
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this article general overview of research progress in the field of organic agriculture in India was given. This include revalidation of traditional organic practices, invent/discover and commercial production technology for organic inputs and research on organic systems. Some of the future directions of organic research in Indian was also discussed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Sharma, Arun K. (2012) Innovative organic farming in india. ISOFAR newsletter, July 2012, 14, pp. 2-5.
